1.name: Nosferatu
1.description: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

2.name: Dr. Mabuse, der Spieler
2.description: Arch-criminal Dr. Mabuse sets out to make a fortune and run Berlin. Detective Wenk sets out to stop him.

3.name: Robin Hood
3.description: A nobleman becomes the vigilante Robin Hood who protects the oppressed English people from the tyrannical Prince John.

4.name: Foolish Wives
4.description: A con artist masquerades a Russian nobility and attempts to seduce the wife of an American diplomat.

7.name: Oliver Twist
7.description: An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

8.name: Salomé
8.description: Salome, the daughter of Herodias, seduces her step-father/uncle Herod, governor of Judea, with a salacious dance. In return, he promises her the head of the prophet John the Baptist.

9.name: Blood and Sand
9.description: A toreador's familial and social life is threatened when he has an affair.

10.name: Phantom
10.description: A shiftless young man becomes obsessed with a mysterious woman and yearns to find her again.

11.name: Sherlock Holmes
11.description: A young Sherlock Holmes seeks to bring down the criminal mastermind Moriarty as he solves a crime involving a blackmailed prince.

12.name: Grandma's Boy
12.description: A meek young man must find the courage within when a rogue tramp menaces his home town.

13.name: Monte Cristo
13.description: A film adaptation of the classic Alexandre Dumas novel. Edmond Dantes is falsely accused by those jealous of his good fortune, and is sentenced to spend the rest of his life in the ...                See full summary »

14.name: Der brennende Acker
14.description: When farmer Rog dies, his son Peter stays, but Johannes can not be satisfied with such a condition (and servant Maria's love) and finds a job as old Count Rudenberg's secretary. His ...                See full summary »

15.name: Beyond the Rocks
15.description: A young woman marries an older millionaire and then falls in love with a handsome nobleman on her honeymoon.

16.name: The Toll of the Sea
16.description: While visiting China, an American man falls in love with a young Chinese woman, but he then has second thoughts about the relationship.

17.name: Shadows
17.description: A dying Chinese man converts to Christianity in order to stop a friend from being blackmailed.

18.name: A Doll's House
18.description: Nora Helmer has years earlier committed a forgery in order to save the life of her authoritarian husband Torvald. Now she is being blackmailed lives in fear of her husband's finding out and...                See full summary »

19.name: A Blind Bargain
19.description: Lon Chaney performs two roles: Doctor Lamb, a mad surgeon who's doing experiments on human bodies, and his crippled and apish assistant, the result of his first experiment.

20.name: Das Weib des Pharao
20.description: The Ethiopian King offers his daughter to a powerful Pharaoh to secure peace between the two countries.

21.name: Vem dömer
21.description: The young girl Ursula is forced to marry an older man that she hates.

22.name: Die Gezeichneten
22.description: Based on the 1918 novel 'Elsker hverandre' by Aage Madelung, the film follows various lives, one of which is Jewish girl Hanne Liebe, as she grows up, and experiences the pains of living as a Jew in Russia, leading to a revolution.

23.name: The Prisoner of Zenda
23.description: When the king is drugged and abducted by his ambitious brother, a lookalike relative must take his place to keep the evil sibling off the throne.

24.name: Manslaughter
24.description: Society-girl thrill seeker Lydia causes the death of motorcycle policeman and is prosecuted by her fiancé Daniel who describes in lurid detail the downfall of Rome. While she's in prison she reforms and Daniel becomes a wasted alcoholic.

25.name: The Young Rajah
25.description: A young man raised in the American South discovers he is an Indian prince whose throne was taken by usurpers.

26.name: Sodom und Gomorrha
26.description: When the old multimillionaire Jackson Harber wants to marry the young model Mary, she hesitates, but her mother convinces her that this is her chance to lead a life in luxury and leisure. ...                See full summary »

27.name: Anderssonskans Kalle
27.description: Anderssonskans Kalle is the horror of the neighborhood due to his mischief.

29.name: Down to the Sea in Ships
29.description: Story of the lives of the people in a small Quaker community and the adventures of a whaling ship.

30.name: Flesh and Blood
30.description: A convict hiding in Chinatown assumes the identity of a cripple to track down a businessman who framed him 15 years previously. He discovers that his daughter has fallen in love with the businessman's son.

31.name: The Beautiful and Damned
31.description: Gloria, the daughter in a wealthy family, has finally spent most of her father's money. She marries Tony, whose as much of a reckless spendthrift as she is, and they continue indulging ...                See full summary »

32.name: Dr. Jack
32.description: Country Doctor, Jack Jackson is called in to treat the Sick-Little-Well-Girl, who has been making Dr. Saulsbourg and is sanitarium very rich, after years of unsuccessful treatment. His ...                See full summary »

33.name: The Headless Horseman
33.description: The village of Sleepy Hollow is getting ready to greet the new schoolteacher, Ichabod Crane, who is coming from New York. Crane has already heard of the village's legendary ghost, a ...                See full summary »

34.name: When Knighthood Was in Flower
34.description: Mary Tudor, sister of England's Henry VIII, causes a stir by falling in love with a guardsman below her class.

35.name: Luffar-Petter
35.description: Peter joins the army after fleeing from the repercussions of a love affair. Greta is one of the daughters of a mayor from the army. Her father is the major, at whose town Peter's army ...                See full summary »

36.name: The Ghost Breaker
36.description: A young man and his manservant, escaping from a backwoods family feud, are persuaded by a beautiful young heiress to help her rid her newly-gained Spanish castle of ghosts. The ghostly ...                See full summary »

37.name: The Trap
37.description: A miner's happiness is destroyed when a rival steals his mine. He becomes obsessed with revenge, and plans a trap for the man who took his mine.

38.name: Smilin' Through
38.description: Kathleen, a young Irish woman, is in love with Kenneth Wayne but is prevented from marrying him by her guardian John Carteret. John is haunted by memories of his thwarted love for Kathleen's aunt, Moonyean.

39.name: Marizza, genannt die Schmuggler-Madonna
39.description: All men are under lovely Maritza's spell.Tired of working for the old woman Yelina, who forces her to cajole customs officials to help the smugglers, she flees and finds work at Mrs. Avricolos' farm.

40.name: Tess of the Storm Country
40.description: Wealthy Elias Graves builds his home on the top of a hill, where a group of squatters have taken up residence at the bottom. Many of the men in the squatters' village have their eyes on ...                See full summary »

41.name: The Dictator
41.description: Pursued by a cab driver for an unpaid fare, a millionaire's son, Brooke Travers ( Wallace Reid ), hides on a steamer, and both men find themselves en route to South America, where they are ...                See full summary »

42.name: Penrod
42.description: Young rapscallion Penrod Schofield causes a good deal of trouble in his community, all in the name of protecting kids from too-strict parents and nasty neighbors. He heads the ABPA (...                See full summary »

45.name: The Man from Beyond
45.description: A man who has been frozen in the Arctic ice for 100 years returns to civilization to find his lost love.

46.name: Lorna Doone
46.description: In 17th-century England, an outlaw clan kidnaps a young girl, who grows up among them. The farm boy who met her just before the kidnapping eventually rescues her, and they fall in love.

47.name: Beauty's Worth
47.description: Prudence Cole is an unsophisticated Quaker girl being raised by her two aunts. Prudence is flirted with by snobbish Henry Garrison, who actually disdains the girl for her lack of ...                See full summary »

48.name: Crainquebille
48.description: A poor vegetable peddler in Paris runs afoul of the law and finds himself ground up in the cogs of the corrupt French judicial system.

49.name: Lucrezia Borgia
49.description: Rodrigo Borgia, Pope Alexander VI, has three adult children: Juan, who is virtuous and has a sweetheart who is a woman of the people, Lucrezia, who is virtuous and wants to marry Alfonso, ...                See full summary »

50.name: Serum of Evil
50.description: A re-titled, separately re-released episode from the 1920 serial, The $1,000,000 Reward, directed by George A. Lessey, and starring Lillian Walker and Coit Albertson.
